trans-unit.source: %{doctor_name} appreciates your response and is committed to improving your care.
trans-unit.target: %{doctor_name} agradece su respuesta y se compromete a mejorar su atención.

file.body:
Does %{subaccount_name} have any current conditions, medications, and allergies that our doctors should know about? ¿Tiene %{subaccount_name} alguna condición actual, medicamentos y alergias que nuestros médicos deben saber? ¿
Is this an up-to-date list of current conditions, medications, and allergies that our doctors should know about for %{subaccount_name}? ¿Es esta una lista actualizada de las condiciones actuales, medicamentos y alergias que nuestros médicos deben saber sobre %{subaccount_name}?
Do you have any current conditions, medications, and allergies that our doctors should know about? ¿Tienes alguna condición actual, medicamentos y alergias que nuestros médicos deben conocer?/target>
Is this an up-to-date list of current conditions, medications, and allergies that our doctors should know about for you? ¿Es esta una lista actualizada de las condiciones actuales, medicamentos y alergias que nuestros médicos deben saber sobre usted?

trans-unit.source: - Answered by top doctors on HealthTap
trans-unit.target: - Respondidas por los mejores doctores de HealthTap

trans-unit.source: TED 2016 Special: HealthTap Prime for peace of mind
trans-unit.target: TED 2016 Especial: HealthTap Prime para la tranquilidad

trans-unit.resname: Please enter a search term, or...
trans-unit.source: Please enter a search term, or...
trans-unit.target: Por favor introduzca un término de búsqueda, o ..

trans-unit.resname: In the unlikely event that the consult cannot be completed successfully or the patient behaves inappropriately, please flag the consult. This notifies us and ends the consult. Always inform your patient before you press the flag, as it will end the consult.
trans-unit.source: In the unlikely event that the consult cannot be completed successfully or the patient behaves inappropriately, please flag the consult. This notifies us and ends the consult. Always inform your patient before you press the flag, as it will end the consult.
trans-unit.target: En el caso improbable de que la consulta no se pueda completar con éxito o el paciente se comporte de manera inapropiada, por favo señale la consulta. Esto nos notifica y termina la consulta. Siempre informe a su paciente antes de presionar flag, ya que finalizará la consulta.

trans-unit.resname: Your phone number {phone_number} and payment method is now linked to a HealthTap account
trans-unit.source: Your phone number {phone_number} and payment method is now linked to a HealthTap account
trans-unit.target: Su número de teléfono {phone_number} y el método de pago ahora están vinculados a una cuenta de HealthTap
Iniciar una consulta con el médico

trans-unit.resname: Call us at the following number
trans-unit.source: Call us at the following number

trans-unit.resname: 1# You may still request to connect, however you will only be able to consult {doctor_prefix}{last_name} when you are traveling to this location.|# You may still request to connect, however you will only be able to consult {doctor_prefix}{last_name} when you are traveling to one of these locations.
trans-unit.source: 1# You may still request to connect, however you will only be able to consult {doctor_prefix}{last_name} when you are traveling to this location.|# You may still request to connect, however you will only be able to consult {doctor_prefix}{last_name} when you are traveling to one of these locations.
trans-unit.target: 1 Todavía puede solicitar conectarse, sin embargo, solo podrá consultar {doctor_prefix}{last_name} cuando viaje a esta ubicación. Sólo podrá consultar {doctor_prefix}{last_name} cuando viaje a una de estas ubicaciones.

trans-unit.target: Por favor, reserva un video chat o envíe un mensaje seguro:

trans-unit.target: Cuando incies la sesión, estás de acuerdo con los siguientes de HealthTap:
